name: Stress Ball Breaker
description:
Stress Ball Breaker is a new variant of the arcade classic Breakout game. Your goal is simple: complete as many levels as you can before you run out of time.

Originally made for macOS and iOS, Stress Ball Breaker is now available on Windows. This version has been fully rewritten in Lua with the LÖVE engine.

Requirements:

  • A PC running Windows Vista (64-bit only) or later.
  • ARM processors are not supported. On Windows 11, the game can run in x64 emulation mode. There may be performance issues in this mode.
  • Game controllers are supported.

This game is still under development. New features will be added in future versions.

Features

Stress Ball Breaker is not a classic breakout game. It contains some exciting features that will spice up the game a little bit!

Various levels

Levels are full of bricks and special blocks, such as switches, doors, 1-2-3 blocks, living bricks that move away when a ball approaches them... completing a level will not be fun!

Catch the capsules

Sometimes, when you destroy a brick, a colored capsule will fall out. Choose them carefully! Some of them can make your task even more complicated.

Paddles

When you catch a certain capsule, you can get a more powerful paddle that could help you in your task... or an annoying one that will complicate it.

Balls

You will never play all the time with just one ball. By catching certain capsules, you can get up to 5 balls on the playing area. Some of them can be colored and may behave differently.

Each game is timed

Complete as many levels as possible before the counter reaches zero. No need to rush, you can get additional time by catching certain capsules.

Wanna give it a try?

Just download and run the demo version below. The demo version is feature complete but has a limited set of levels.
